ai.summary: A gentle 5.5 km route through Dolaucothi Parkland in the UK. Suitable for beginners and families, it follows well-marked paths across parkland with scenic rural views and mild terrain.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat to gently undulating terrain. The route uses a mix of grassy trails, compacted dirt paths, and occasional gravel sections. Some areas may be muddy after rain; good footwear with tread is recommended.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and daylight before starting. Wear sturdy walking shoes and dress in layers. Stay on marked paths and respect local access rules. Be mindful of livestock in rural areas. Carry water, snacks, and a small first aid kit. Have a map or offline navigation in case of limited mobile signal.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or light hiking boots
Weather-appropriate layers and a lightweight waterproof shell
Sun protection (hat, sunscreen) or rain gear as needed
Map, guidebook, or offline map on a device
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March–October) is ideal, but the route can be enjoyed year-round with appropriate weather gear.

seo.title: Dolaucothi Parkland Walk – Easy 5.5 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Dolaucothi Parkland Walk, an easy 5.5 km hike in the UK. Gentle terrain, family-friendly scenery, practical safety tips, and gear recommendations.
